ValidationRule.description: Fields Required for Manual Lead Conversion
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( OR( ( $Profile.Name='Marketing User'), ($Profile.Name='Read Only'), ($Profile.Name='Solution Manager'), ($Profile.Name='Standard User'), ($Profile.Name='Xometry Sales User'), ( $Profile.Name='Xometry Service User'), ( $Profile.Name='Xometry Sales Leadership') ), IsConverted = True, OR(ISBLANK( FirstName ), ISBLANK(LastName), ISBLANK( Email), ISBLANK( Phone ) ) )
&& !$Permission.Ignore_All_VR && !$Permission.Ignore_Lead_VR
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please Make Sure to Fill Out all Information Required for the Lead to be Converted: First Name, Last Name, Email, and Phone.
